media

Interface Encoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EncoderXuggle

    public interface Encoder
    Interface for the media emcoder. The encoder should be able to creat a writing container and add audio and video streams to render a playlist The interface decouples and all types have been made generic, using the adapter pattern, for use in other frameworks
    Author:
    tony

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAudioStreamTo(MediaWriter writer, StreamCoder audioCodec)
      Adds an audio stream to an instantiated writer so that it can give it an ID, index and hold it in a container
      void addVideoStreamTo(MediaWriter writer)
      Adds a video stream to an instantiated writer so that it can give it an ID, index and hold it in a container
      MediaWriter getWriter(String filename)
      Gets a new media writer so that it can start a container to hold media data on disk
      void render(Playlist playlist)
      When passed a playlist, will render the theme that has already been set for the encoder over that playlist

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(Playlist playlist)
        When passed a playlist, will render the theme that has already been set for the encoder over that playlist
        Parameters:
        playlist - a playlist of music videos

      • getWriter

        MediaWriter getWriter(String filename)
        Gets a new media writer so that it can start a container to hold media data on disk
        Parameters:
        filepath - the file representing the container will have

      • addVideoStreamTo

        void addVideoStreamTo(MediaWriter writer)
        Adds a video stream to an instantiated writer so that it can give it an ID, index and hold it in a container
        Parameters:
        writer - the writer which is going to have a video stream addded to it

      • addAudioStreamTo

        void addAudioStreamTo(MediaWriter writer,
                    StreamCoder audioCodec)
        Adds an audio stream to an instantiated writer so that it can give it an ID, index and hold it in a container
        Parameters:
        writer - the writer which is going to have a audio stream addded to it
        audioCodec - the audio codec which is going to be used to write
